channel.title: Look at this funny thing
channel.description:
EDIT: I posted the important part two posts after this one... but the whole convo is here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,38246.0.html Read after my first post. And look at my reply to the noob who said I was a Jagex mod. The next day he sent me this message:
you hate andrew?? « Sent to: g00dg0d on: November 28, 2006, 07:39:10 PM » if you are a jagex mod...trade me a christmas cracker that you spawned plz my username is deoxys5055 and plz tell me some good cheats for rs...iff you really are a mod
[Hide from Jagex] I really am a Jagex employee though. Just dont want the word to spread too fast. :|[/Hide from Jagex] And Note that I am not calling this person a dumbass or anything I just thought it was funny how gullible some people are on these forums.

item.title: Look at this funny thing
item.dc:creator: @Cheatest Cheatest
item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:11, topic:32727”][quote author=g00dg0d link=topic=47345.msg593714#msg593714 date=1165706257]
??? Why ??? Who says employees get paid anything big. Just because your my friend doesnt mean I tell you everything.
[/quote]

The jagex corporate site says they do

Starting salary for most is 17-50 thousand pounds…[/quote]
I have no idea what you are smoking the highest is 40k and thats for Game Content Team Leader and how many leaders do you need… id think 1 person is a leader not 100.
http://www.jagex.com/corporate/index.ws

look for yourself and for most is 20-25…

Read full topic

item.title: Look at this funny thing
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:12, topic:32727”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=47345.msg593774#msg593774 date=1165706728]

??? Why ??? Who says employees get paid anything big. Just because your my friend doesnt mean I tell you everything.

The jagex corporate site says they do

Starting salary for most is 17-50 thousand pounds…
[/quote]

50?! Dribbles[/quote]

Yeah and that’s just the starting salary. I would assume it goes up a few thousand each year.

Read full topic

item.title: Look at this funny thing
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

Oh ya… its close to the bottom of the thread I posted. And the person is poopy4231 or something.

hey g00dg0d i think your a jagex staff member because all of your posts are in the general discussion and the rest 7 are in talk about runescape.. maybe you are maybe you arent
Ya you guys are right Im a Jagex Ltd employee. But I cheat to show how much I hate Andrew. I just play so I can share Jagex secrets with others.

Read full topic

programming, irc, cars

Read after my first post. And look at my reply to the noob who said I was a Jagex mod.

The next day he sent me this message:

you hate andrew?? « Sent to: g00dg0d on: November 28, 2006, 07:39:10 PM »

if you are a jagex mod…trade me a christmas cracker that you spawned plz my username is deoxys5055 and plz tell me some good cheats for rs…iff you really are a mod

[Hide from Jagex] I really am a Jagex employee though. Just dont want the word to spread too fast. :|[/Hide from Jagex]

And Note that I am not calling this person a dumbass or anything I just thought it was funny how gullible some people are on these forums.
